profile.intro: My name is Jarod Kohler and I'm a student in my last year of the BUT (Bachelor of Technology) program at the IUT in Belfort. Curious by nature, I'm always on the lookout for new knowledge and challenges. That's why I've chosen to do my final year of work-study at Web & Design in Montbéliard.
profile.values: Every project I've worked on has been an opportunity to learn and grow, both professionally and personally. I also value integrity, teamwork and innovation. In September 2024, I'll be joining ENSISA in Mulhouse, an engineering school specializing in software development.
profile.passions: Aside from programming, I'm passionate about video games, creative hobbies, sports, travel and cars. These activities allow me to escape, stimulate my creativity, stay active and discover new horizons.

contact.title: Keep in touch!
contact.available: I'm available to work on your project!
contact.notAvailable: I'm not yet available for a new project.
